description.value:
Unnatural Origin

"Some are born under ill stars, touched by forces that should remain nameless. They carry marks that set them apart—not by choice, but by fate's cruel hand."

Whether by accident of birth, exposure to forbidden energies, or the touch of the Warp itself, you bear the stigma of the unnatural. Perhaps you were raised in environments so toxic that your very flesh mutated to survive. Or maybe you are the product of heretical gene-crafting, a "false-man" created for purposes now lost to time. Some bear the taint of Chaos, touched by the Warp in ways that cannot be undone.

Whatever the source, your nature sets you apart from normal humanity. Some view you with fear, others with disgust. Yet the very forces that marked you have also granted you unusual capabilities—gifts that come at terrible cost. In the Imperium, such origins are grounds for execution, but in the vastness of the void, there are places where the desperate and the damned can find purpose.

Advanced Origin Rules

This origin path contains three powerful options, each with an associated Experience Point cost. Choose ONE option from those presented below and pay the listed XP cost from your starting experience. This choice must be made during character creation and cannot be changed later.

Note: If an option grants you training in a skill or talent you already possess, you may instead gain +10 to that skill OR reduce the XP cost by 50 (for duplicate talents).

options.label: Contaminated Environs (100 XP)
options.description: You grew up in toxic wastelands or mutant-infested zones where survival required adaptation. Your body has been hardened by exposure to poisons and disease, and you understand the ways of the outcasts.

options.label: Roll for 1 mutation (reroll 75+) [+100 XP]
options.description: You may pay an additional 100 XP to roll once on the mutation table, rerolling results of 75 or higher.

options.label: False-Man (300 XP)
options.description: You are a gene-crafted creation, built for purposes unknown—perhaps a failed experiment or a heretical masterwork. Your body is optimized beyond normal human limits, but your mind bears scars from the process.

choices.label: Choose two characteristics to increase by +3
Choose one characteristic to reduce by -3

options.label: Tainted by the Warp (200 XP)
options.description: The Warp has touched you—whether through exposure to the Immaterium, proximity to psykers, or darker circumstances. You sense things others cannot, but the price is corruption of body and soul.

choices.label: Optional: Favoured by the Warp (requires +300 XP)

options.label: Gain Favoured by the Warp talent and +1d10 Corruption [+300 XP]
options.description: You may pay an additional 300 XP to gain the Favoured by the Warp talent, but you also gain an additional 1d10 Corruption Points.

system.effectText:
Effect: Choose one of the following paths and pay its XP cost:

  • Contaminated Environs (100 XP): Choose +3 Toughness or +3 Willpower, suffer -3 Fellowship. Gain Peer (Mutants) and Resistance (Poisons) talents. Optional: Pay +100 XP to roll for 1 mutation (reroll 75+).
  • False-Man (300 XP): Gain Ambidextrous, Autosanguine, and Chem-Geld talents. Increase two characteristics by +3 and reduce one by -3. Gain 2d10 Insanity Points or lose 1 Fate Point.
  • Tainted by the Warp (200 XP): Choose +3 Perception or +3 Willpower, suffer -3 Fellowship. Gain Dark Soul and Jaded talents, Forbidden Lore (Warp) as untrained skill, and 1d10 Corruption Points. Optional: Pay +300 XP for Favoured by the Warp talent and +1d10 Corruption.
